      Boolean selectBoolean(Node node, String xpath)

      Extract a boolean value from node or return defaultValue if there is no boolean value at xpath
      Double selectDouble(Node node, String xpath)
      Extract a double precision floating point value from node or return null if it is not found

      Extract an integer value from node or return null if it is not found

      Select the Node list with the given XPath.
      String selectString(Node node, String xpath)
      Extract the given value from the node as a String or if the value cannot be extracted, the empty string is returned

      Example: To get the value of the attribute "foo" in the node, specify "@foo" as the path.

      • selectString

        public String selectString(Node node,
                  String xpath,
                  String defaultValue)
        Description copied from interface: XPathSelector
        Extract the given value from the node as a String or if the value cannot be extracted, defaultValue is returned.

        Example: To get the value of the attribute "foo" in the node, specify "@foo" as the path.

        Note: This method does not handle namespaces explicitely.

        Specified by:
        selectString in interface XPathSelector
        Parameters:
        node - the node with the wanted attribute
        xpath - the XPath to extract.
        defaultValue - the default value
        Returns:
        the value of the path, if existing, else defaultValue

      • selectString

        public String selectString(Node node,
                  String xpath)
        Description copied from interface: XPathSelector
        Extract the given value from the node as a String or if the value cannot be extracted, the empty string is returned

        Example: To get the value of the attribute "foo" in the node, specify "@foo" as the path.

        Note: This method does not handle namespaces explicitely.

        Specified by:
        selectString in interface XPathSelector
        Parameters:
        node - the node with the wanted attribute
        xpath - the XPath to extract
        Returns:
        the value of the path, if existing, else the empty string

      • selectNodeList

        public NodeList selectNodeList(Node dom,
                      String xpath)
        Description copied from interface: XPathSelector
        Select the Node list with the given XPath.

        Note: This is a convenience method that logs exceptions instead of throwing them.

        Specified by:
        selectNodeList in interface XPathSelector
        Parameters:
        dom - the root document.
        xpath - the xpath for the Node list.
        Returns:
        the NodeList requested or an empty NodeList if unattainable

      • selectNode

        public Node selectNode(Node dom,
              String xpath)
        Description copied from interface: XPathSelector
        Select the Node with the given XPath.

        Note: This is a convenience method that logs exceptions instead of throwing them.

        Specified by:
        selectNode in interface XPathSelector
        Parameters:
        dom - the root document.
        xpath - the xpath for the node.
        Returns:
        the Node or null if unattainable.
